definition: to remain/to be left/to have as remainder
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Back to arrive home leftovers all didn't even.
Separate large amounts of leftovers into small, shallow containers.
sentences.chinese: 把大量的剩菜分开放进又小又浅的容器中。

sentences.english: The table was littered with remains of eatables.
sentences.chinese: 餐桌上到处是残羹剩菜。

sentences.english: And they can always take their leftovers home without being embarrassed.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能经常把剩饭剩菜带回家，不必感到尴尬。

sentences.english: We’ll just get a doggie bag.
She cleared the leftovers from the table.
sentences.chinese: 她清掉桌上的剩饭剩菜。

sentences.english: Could you give me a doggy bage?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我一个剩菜袋吗？

sentences.english: He brewed a pot of soup from the leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 他用残羹剩菜煮了一锅汤。

sentences.english: The asteroids we see today are the leftovers from this chaotic period.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天看到的小行星是从这个混乱时期的剩饭剩菜。

sentences.english: Have you guys eaten? Richard and l just finished, and we've got leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 你们吃过了吗？我跟理查刚吃过，我们还有剩菜。

sentences.english: We can broil chicken on the grill tonight, or we can just eat leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天晚上可以烤鸡肉吃，或者吃剩菜。

sentences.english: Some have to pick up leftover food, others go around the streets to beg for food.
sentences.chinese: 有些人捡剩菜，有些则在街上乞食。

sentences.english: We threw together a meal out of leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用剩菜剩饭匆匆凑合了一顿饭。

sentences.english: They pieced out a meal from leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 他们用剩饭剩菜凑合成一顿饭。

sentences.english: I might just warm up the left-overs from yesterday's meal in the microwave.
sentences.chinese: 或许我只需将昨天剩饭剩菜在微波炉里热一下就行了。

definition: leftovers from a meal/fig. remnants handed down from others
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
non-vegetarian dish (including meat, fish, garlic, onion etc)
to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
to soak cooked rice in soup or water/cooked rice reheated in boiling water
plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
